long_description: Made with high-stretch neoprene, the Stohlquist Paddle Maw gloves supply the warmth and dexterity you need to enjoy your paddling adventures. Warm 2mm neoprene supplies insulation and protection without hindering dexterity. Palm and finger grip pads provide exceptional paddle control. Pre-curved fingers minimize gripping fatigue. Pull-on styling eliminates bulk at wrist. Rip-and-stick wrist closures create a close fit to prevent water from entering the Stohlquist Paddle Maw gloves and chilling your fingers.
short_description: Made with high-stretch neoprene, the Stohlquist Paddle Maw gloves supply the warmth and dexterity you need to enjoy your paddling adventures.
